name: browser-compat-data-helpers
description: Helper scripts for working with mdn/browser-compat-data

scripts.copy-pulls: node ./prs.js pulls | pbcopy && osascript -e 'display notification "Pull request numbers copied" with title "BCD meta"'
scripts.copy: node ./prs.js all | pbcopy && osascript -e 'display notification "Pull request data copied" with title "BCD meta"'
